content.rendered:
Kirielle joined Regent College London in March 2021 as a Registry Officer. She graduated from the University of Kent with a BA (Hons) in French and Business Administration.

Before Regent, she worked in the further education sector in France. She is fluent in both French and English. She enjoys working within the education environment as she has a passion for helping others, especially supporting student’s academic journeys. Her aim to fulfil this passion with Regent College London.
